text: Geremy Lombardi (born 4 April 1996) is a Dominican international footballer who plays for A.S. Pro Piacenza 1919 as a forward. Lombardi was eligible for both Italy and Dominican Republic on senior international level due to being born to an Italian father and Dominican mother. He represented Italy at youth level. In 2015, he made his senior international debut for Dominican Republic. ==Career== Lombardi has played for the youth system of Internazionale and Parma. He made his international debut for Dominican Republic on 25 March 2015.
